info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:43PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lubbock and far south central Hale Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 342 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Abernathy, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abernathy and Idalou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
